roleset.name: Owed, required

example.name: long awaited
example.text: Her husband is due for a hip replacement in June.
example.arg: for a hip replacement in June.

example.name: all args
example.text: I am due him a debt of gratitude for. his valuable information, both verbal and clinical.
example.arg: for his valuable information, both verbal and clinical

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: caused by, attributable to

example.name: Arg 1 will often appear in the sentence before arg 0
example.text: The Blackhawks' Stanley Cup victory was due to their superior speed and coaching.
example.arg: to their superior speed and coaching.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: be scheduled for, planned for a time

roles.note: Use ArgM TMP for time scheduled.

role.descr: what arg1 is scheduled to do

roleset.note: Roleset based on AMRs. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All args
example.text: Samples are due to arrive this week.
